title: Kumo's Quest follows
description: a young monkey named Kumo, whose parents are kidnapped by pirates. To save them, Kumo must uncover hidden secrets in the jungle, solving puzzles and discovering his special abilities to unlock new paths and advance through the map.

title: Cursed Legacy
description: is a single-player adventure where you uncover your family’s cursed past through three generations, facing vengeful spirits and solving puzzles to destroy cursed relics and break the family’s curse.

title: Colony Ques
description: is a solo adventure where you control Lart, a larva collecting Ascension Seed fragments to save her colony while avoiding enemies and strengthening her survival skills.
